# abort

**Instance Method**

Aborts the current Apple Pay session.

## Declaration

```swift
undefined abort();
```

## Discussion

Dismisses the payment sheet and ends the Apple Pay session without completing a transaction. Only the web page can call [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePaySession/abort].

## Ending the session

- **oncancel**: An event handler that is automatically called when the payment UI is dismissed.

items.description: An event handler that is automatically called when the payment UI is dismissed.
